overview: Officer Daly is a rookie on the beat who is eager to be the best cop on the force. Attractive, sexy and headstrong, Daly is chastised by her fellow officers. But when their station becomes threatened by possible shut down the stations Sergeant orders his officers to take a more aggressive approach to gaining citations. A bunch of wise-cracking valley cops take on a mission to fill their quotas by any means necessary. No rules, no holes barred, just write those tickets! Upholding the law sometimes means bending the rules just a little...
tagline: Come Quietly or we will be forced to use the handcuffs...
title: Valley 911
